_description: A roundel of Charles d’Orléans — 14 lines

BLHar682.First Lines:
FOr Ipocras nor yet GalienNe may of me the woofull woundis
                    cure…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…But ihesu graunt yow bettir aventureNow take yowre Cup and
                    saith of your wyn
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the rounde.
